name: Polygon: ALIEN ZOMBIES
description:
Can you hear them? - ZOMBIES IN THE NEIGHBORHOOD! Its up to you to save the town, will Spoonerville survive the Aliens and Zombies?

Hello! We are a two person team based in Ukraine and USA, we hope you enjoy our game as much as we have enjoy this venture together! 

Please let us know of any improvements in the comments below!

Gametime: 1hr~ 

Inspirations: Arcade games like House of the Dead

Tags: Arcade, shooter, speedrun, zombie, survival horror
